title: Husband Addicted to Pornography and I'm Struggling
itunes:title: Husband Addicted to Pornography and I'm Struggling
description:
Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband is addicted to pornography, chatting with women online, and who had an affair as a result. He's getting help but she's struggling. Both Qur'an students, what can she do to be patient while he works on his recovery? 

 

To ask a question of your own visit: www.wivesofjanah.com/askaquestion
content:encoded:
